languages.text: {n}Плечистая фигура Каллигоса пышет силой и могуществом, но напряженно гуляющие желваки выдают его нетерпение.{/n} "Ожидание охоты на этом жестяном корыте тянется целую вечность, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Плечистая фигура Каллигоса пышет силой и могуществом, но напряженно подрагивающие жвалы выдают его нетерпение.{/n} "Ожидание охоты на этом жестяном корыте тянется целую вечность, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Плечистая фигура Каллигоса пышет силой и могуществом, но напряженно гуляющие желваки выдают его нетерпение.{/n} "Ожидание охоты на этом жестяном корыте тянется целую вечность, {name}".

traits.locale_text: n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but the tense jowls give away his impatience.{/n} "Waiting for the hunt in your rust bucket is taking forever, {name}."
n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but the tense jowls give away his impatience.{/n} "Waiting for the hunt in your rust bucket is taking forever, {name}."
{n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but the tense jaw muscles give away his impatience.{/n} "Waiting for the hunt in your rusty bucket is taking forever, {name}."

{n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

{n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Los anchos hombros de Calligos desprenden fuerza y autoridad, pero su tensa mandíbula delata la tensión que siente.{/n} «Esperar en esta bañera a que empiece la cazase me hace eterno, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los anchos hombros de Calligos desprenden fuerza y autoridad, pero su tensa mandíbula delata la tensión que siente.{/n} «Esperar que empiece la caza en este cubo se me hace eterno, {name}».

languages.text: {n}L'imposante silhouette de Calligos respire la force et l'autorité, mais sa mâchoire crispée trahit son impatience.{/n} « J'en ai plus qu'assez d'attendre la chasse dans votre boîte de conserve, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'imposante silhouette de Calligos respire la force et l'autorité, mais sa mâchoire crispée trahit son impatience.{/n} « Ça fait beaucoup trop longtemps que nous attendons la chasse dans votre rafiot, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスの肩幅の広い体格からは力と権威が滲み出ているが、こわばった顎の筋肉がその焦りを裏付けている。{/n}「お前の錆びたバケツで狩りを待つのは、私の忍耐力を試すようなものだぞ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスの肩幅の広い体格からは力と権威が滲み出ているが、こわばった顎の筋肉がその焦りを裏付けている。{/n}「お前の錆びたバケツで狩りを待つのは、私の忍耐力を試すようなものだぞ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯宽阔的肩膀散发着力量与权威的气息，但他紧绷的下巴暴露了他的不耐烦。{/n}“真不知道还得等多久，才能离开你这个生了锈的破桶，开始狩猎，{name}。这简直是在考验我的耐心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯宽阔的肩膀散发着力量与权威的气息，但他紧绷的下巴暴露了他的急躁。{/n}“真不知道还得等多久，才能离开你这个生了锈的破桶，开始狩猎，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos' breitschultrige Gestalt strahlt Kraft und Autorität aus, doch sein angespannter Kiefer verrät, wie ungeduldig er ist.{/n} "Auf diesem Rostkübel zu warten, bis die Jagd weitergeht, stellt meine Geduld auf die Probe, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos' breitschultrige Gestalt strahlt Kraft und Autorität aus, doch sein angespannter Kiefer verrät, wie ungeduldig er ist.{/n} "In Eurem Rostkübel auf die Jagd zu warten, dauert eine Ewigkeit, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Calligos, geniş omuzlu suretiyle güçlü ve otoriter bir hava yayıyor ancak gergin çene kaslarının örttüğü sabırsızlığını görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Bu paslı kovanın içinde avın devam etmesini beklemek, sabrımın sınırlarını zorluyor {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's broad-shouldered figure exudes strength and authority, but his tense jaw muscles belie his impatience.{/n} "Waiting on this rust bucket for the hunt to resume is trying my patience, {name}."
